welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nauheim, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming atmosphere and rich history of this spa town. Explore our beautiful parks and indulge in the famous mineral springs. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, dedicated to Lufthansa and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a limited time and data allowance.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Air Base Airport, used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
